title: The Draymond Green Show - Championship Recap + Addressing The Haters
itunes:title: The Draymond Green Show - Championship Recap + Addressing The Haters
description:
In his first offseason podcast Draymond Green recaps the Warriors championship parade and addresses the Skip Baylesses of the world and why it's important to be accountable in sports media. #Herd

Produced by: Jackson Safon

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
